entry.title: Testing ipynb
entry.summary:
Music21 Scale Tables¶

In this notebook we are developing a eye-candy presentation of scale data generated by music21 and our music21 toolchain.

Web of Reference¶

Music / Sheet Music¶

  • music21 THIS ^
  • abcjs

Tables¶

  • SVG
    • svgwrite WIN!!
    • plim
  • pandas / style
  • d3.js

Colors¶

  • matplotlib
    • Pyplot colormap line by line – StackOverflow
    • Choosing Colormaps – Matplotlib
    • cm (colormap)
    • colors – Matplotlib
  • colormap (pypi)
  • palettable / source
  • pallete (pypi)
  • colour (pypi)
  • Solarized Color Scheme

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h1 id="Music21-Scale-Tables">Music21 Scale Tables<a class="anchor-link" href="#Music21-Scale-Tables">¶</a></h1><p>In this notebook we are developing a eye-candy presentation of scale data generated by music21 and our music21 toolchain.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Web-of-Reference">Web of Reference<a class="anchor-link" href="#Web-of-Reference">¶</a></h2><h3 id="Music-/-Sheet-Music">Music / Sheet Music<a class="anchor-link" href="#Music-/-Sheet-Music">¶</a></h3><ul>
<li><a href="http://web.mit.edu/music21/doc/moduleReference/index.html">music21</a> <strong>THIS ^</strong></li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/paulrosen/abcjs">abcjs</a></li>
</ul>
<h3 id="Tables">Tables<a class="anchor-link" href="#Tables">¶</a></h3><ul>
<li>SVG<ul>
<li><a href="http://pythonhosted.org/svgwrite/">svgwrite</a> <strong>WIN!!</strong></li>
<li><a href="https://plim.readthedocs.io/en/latest/syntax.html">plim</a></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><a href="">pandas</a> / <a href="http://pandas.pydata.org/pandas-docs/version/0.18.1/style.html">style</a></li>
<li><a href="https://d3js.org/">d3.js</a></li>
</ul>
<h3 id="Colors">Colors<a class="anchor-link" href="#Colors">¶</a></h3><ul>
<li>matplotlib<ul>
<li><a href="http://stackoverflow.com/questions/27443050/pyplot-colormap-line-by-line">Pyplot colormap line by line – StackOverflow</a></li>
<li><a href="http://matplotlib.org/users/colormaps.html">Choosing Colormaps – Matplotlib</a></li>
<li><a href="http://matplotlib.org/api/cm_api.html">cm (colormap)</a></li>
<li><a href="http://matplotlib.org/api/colors_api.html">colors – Matplotlib</a></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><a href="https://pypi.python.org/pypi/colormap">colormap (pypi)</a></li>
<li><a href="https://jiffyclub.github.io/palettable">palettable</a> / <a href="https://github.com/jiffyclub/palettable">source</a></li>
<li><a href="https://pypi.python.org/pypi/palette">pallete (pypi)</a></li>
<li><a href="https://pypi.python.org/pypi/colour">colour (pypi)</a></li>
<li><a href="http://ethanschoonover.com/solarized">Solarized Color Scheme</a></li>
<li><a href="http://chrisalbon.com/python/seaborn_color_palettes.html">Seaborn</a> <strong>Very probably..</strong></li>
<li><a href="http://colour-science.org/">Colour Science</a></li>
<li>Hardcode? <strong>Very probably</strong></li>
</ul>

<li>sqlite3</li>
<li><a href="http://docs.sqlalchemy.org/en/rel_1_1/">sqlalchemy</a></li>
</ul>
<h3 id="etc">etc<a class="anchor-link" href="#etc">¶</a></h3><ul>
<li><a href="https://ipython.org/ipython-doc/3/interactive/magics.html">Jupyter Magics</a></li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [1]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">music21</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="o">*</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">IPython.display</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">display</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">HTML</span> <span class="c1">#, Image, Audio</span>
<span class="c1">#import plim</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">base64</span>
<span class="c1">#from music21.common.pathTools import relativepath as m21_jupyter_relpath</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">PIL</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">Image</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="n">PILImage</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">svgwrite</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">sw</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">seaborn</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [2]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">circleOfFifths</span><span class="p">():</span>
    <span class="n">fifths</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>

    <span class="n">fifthsScale</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">scale</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">CyclicalScale</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'c4'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'p5'</span><span class="p">)</span>
    
    <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">p</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">fifthsScale</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">getPitches</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'c4'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'c11'</span><span class="p">):</span>
        
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">key</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">pitchToSharps</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">p</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'major'</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o"><=</span> <span class="mi">7</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="n">MAJOR</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">p</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">simplifyEnharmonic</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">name</span><span class="p">)</span>
            <span class="n">MINOR</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">key</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Key</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">MAJOR</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'major'</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">relative</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">tonic</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">simplifyEnharmonic</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">name</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">lower</span><span class="p">()</span>

        <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="n">MAJOR</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">p</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">getEnharmonic</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">simplifyEnharmonic</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">name</span><span class="p">)</span>
            <span class="n">MINOR</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">key</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Key</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">MAJOR</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'major'</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">relative</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">tonic</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">simplifyEnharmonic</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">name</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">lower</span><span class="p">()</span>
        
        <span class="n">fifths</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span> <span class="p">[</span> <span class="n">MAJOR</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">MINOR</span> <span class="p">]</span> <span class="p">)</span>

        <span class="c1">#fifths.append(p.simplifyEnharmonic())</span>
        
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">fifths</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="The-returnScale()-function">The returnScale() function<a class="anchor-link" href="#The-returnScale()-function">¶</a></h2><p>This function returns a <code>dict()</code> with the data and filename of our generated scale.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [3]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">returnScale</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">tonic</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'c'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">mode</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'major'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ownKey</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">):</span>
    
    <span class="n">modes</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span> <span class="s1">'ionian'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'dorian'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'phrygian'</span><span class="p">,</span>
              <span class="s1">'lydian'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'mixolydian'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'aeolian'</span><span class="p">,</span>
              <span class="s1">'locrian'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'major'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'minor'</span><span class="p">]</span>
    
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="ow">not</span> <span class="n">mode</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">modes</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">mode</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'major'</span>
        
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">mode</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'ionian'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">mode</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'major'</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">mode</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'aeolian'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">mode</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'minor'</span>

    <span class="n">tonic_pitch</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pitch</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Pitch</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">tonic</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">scale_sharps</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">key</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">pitchToSharps</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">tonic_pitch</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">mode</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="n">scale_func</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">getattr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">scale</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"</span><span class="si">{0}</span><span class="s2">Scale"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">mode</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">capitalize</span><span class="p">()))</span>
    <span class="n">real_scale</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">scale_func</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">tonic_pitch</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">pitches</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">real_scale</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">getPitches</span><span class="p">()</span>

    <span class="n">scale_name</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">real_scale</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">name</span>
    <span class="n">absolute_intervals</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
    <span class="n">relative_intervals</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
    <span class="n">note_names</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
    <span class="n">myKeySig</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">key</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">KeySignature</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">scale_sharps</span><span class="p">)</span>
    
    <span class="n">mystream</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">stream</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Stream</span><span class="p">()</span>
    
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">ownKey</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">mystream</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">myKeySig</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">idx</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">cur_pitch</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">enumerate</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">pitches</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="n">mynote</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">note</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Note</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cur_pitch</span><span class="p">)</span>

        <span class="n">cur_degree</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">real_scale</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">getScaleDegreeFromPitch</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cur_pitch</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">past_degree_or_tonic</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">cur_degree</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">cur_degree</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mi">1</span> <span class="k">else</span> <span class="mi">1</span>
        
        <span class="n">absolute_interval</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">real_scale</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">intervalBetweenDegrees</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">cur_degree</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">name</span>
        <span class="c1">#relative_interval_semitones = real_scale.intervalBetweenDegrees(past_degree_or_tonic, cur_degree).semitones</span>
        <span class="k">try</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="n">relative_interval_semitones</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">interval</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">notesToChromatic</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cur_pitch</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">pitches</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">idx</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">])</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">semitones</span>
        <span class="k">except</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="c1">#pass</span>
            <span class="n">relative_interval_semitones</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'None'</span>
        <span class="c1">#relative_interval = real_scale.intervalBetweenDegrees(past_degree_or_tonic, cur_degree).name</span>
        
        <span class="n">absolute_intervals</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">absolute_interval</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">relative_intervals</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">relative_interval_semitones</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">note_names</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cur_pitch</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">unicodeName</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="c1">#mynote.addLyric(absolute_interval)</span>
        <span class="c1">#mynote.addLyric(relative_interval_semitones)</span>
        
        <span class="n">mystream</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">mynote</span><span class="p">)</span>
        
    <span class="n">filename</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">mystream</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">write</span><span class="p">()</span>
        
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="p">{</span>
        <span class="s1">'scalename'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">scale_name</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="s1">'stream'</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">mystream</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="s1">'filename'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">filename</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="s1">'ai'</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">absolute_intervals</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="s1">'ri'</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">relative_intervals</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="s1">'nn'</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">note_names</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="p">}</span>
</pre></div>

<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">svg_table2</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">sc</span><span class="p">):</span>

        <span class="n">b64_scale</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">base64</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">b64encode</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">image_file</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">read</span><span class="p">())</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">decode</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'utf8'</span><span class="p">)</span>

        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">line_num</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">line_height</span>

    <span class="n">background</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">sw</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shapes</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Rect</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">insert</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">table_width</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">table_height</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="o">**</span><span class="n">background_attrs</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">dwg</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">add</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">background</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="n">group_els</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span>

    <span class="n">dwg</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">add</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">table_image</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="c1">#array2 = ["I","II","III","IV","V","VI","VII","VIII"]</span>
    <span class="n">cell_group</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">sw</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">container</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Group</span><span class="p">()</span>

    <span class="n">group_els</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span>
        <span class="n">sw</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">image</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Image</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">href</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">image_data</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">insert</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">line_height</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">img_w</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">img_h</span><span class="p">)),</span>
        <span class="n">sw</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shapes</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Rect</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">insert</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">line_height</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">img_w</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">img_h</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="o">**</span><span class="n">img_rect_attrs</span><span class="p">),</span>

    <span class="n">dwg</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">add</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cell_group</span><span class="p">)</span>
    
    <span class="n">list_of_intervals</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">sc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'ai'</span><span class="p">]</span>

        <span class="n">h_center</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cell_width</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">x</span>

        <span class="n">group_els</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span>
            <span class="n">sw</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shapes</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Rect</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">insert</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cell_width</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">line_height</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="o">**</span><span class="n">cell_rect_attrs</span><span class="p">),</span>
            <span class="n">sw</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">text</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Text</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">item</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">insert</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">h_center</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">v_center</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="o">**</span><span class="n">cell_text_attrs</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="p">]</span>

        <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">element</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">group_els</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="n">cell_group</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">add</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">element</span><span class="p">)</span>

        <span class="n">dwg</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">add</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cell_group</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="c1"># NOTE NAMES</span>
    <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">idx</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">item</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">enumerate</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">sc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'nn'</span><span class="p">]):</span>

        <span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">idx</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">cell_width</span>
        <span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">y_by_line</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">line_num</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">line_height</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">line_height</span><span class="p">)</span>

        <span class="n">v_center</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">line_height</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">y</span>
        <span class="n">h_center</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cell_width</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">x</span>

        <span class="n">cell_group</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">sw</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">container</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Group</span><span class="p">()</span>

        <span class="n">group_els</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span>
            <span class="n">sw</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shapes</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Rect</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">insert</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cell_width</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">line_height</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="o">**</span><span class="n">cell_rect_attrs</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">**</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'class'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'nn-</span><span class="si">{}</span><span class="s1">'</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">list_of_intervals</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">idx</span><span class="p">])}),</span>
            <span class="n">sw</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">text</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Text</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">item</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">insert</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">h_center</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">v_center</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="o">**</span><span class="n">cell_text_attrs</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">**</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'class'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'nn-</span><span class="si">{}</span><span class="s1">'</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">list_of_intervals</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">idx</span><span class="p">])})</span>
        <span class="p">]</span>

        <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">element</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">group_els</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="n">cell_group</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">add</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">element</span><span class="p">)</span>

        <span class="n">dwg</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">add</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cell_group</span><span class="p">)</span>
        
    <span class="c1"># INTERVALS</span>
    <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">idx</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">item</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">enumerate</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">sc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'ri'</span><span class="p">]):</span>
        <span class="n">v_center</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">line_height</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">idx</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">y_by_line</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">line_num</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">7</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">line_height</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">line_height</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">h_center</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cell_width</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">y_by_line</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">line_num</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">7</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">line_height</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">line_height</span><span class="p">)</span>

        <span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">idx</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">cell_width</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cell_width</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">y_by_line</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">line_num</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">7</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">line_height</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">line_height</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">line_height</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span>
        
        <span class="n">path_h_pad</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">cell_width</span> <span class="o">/</span><span class="mi">10</span>
        <span class="n">path_width</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">cell_width</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">path_h_pad</span>
        <span class="n">path_height</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">line_height</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">path_v_pad</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">path_height</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">cell_group</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">sw</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">container</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Group</span><span class="p">()</span>
        
        <span class="c1"># minor second</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">item</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="n">path_commands</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span>
                <span class="s1">'M</span><span class="si">{0}</span><span class="s1"> </span><span class="si">{1}</span><span class="s1">'</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">y</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">path_height</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">),</span>
                <span class="s1">'l </span><span class="si">{0}</span><span class="s1"> </span><span class="si">{1}</span><span class="s1">'</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">path_width</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">path_height</span><span class="p">),</span>
                <span class="s1">'l </span><span class="si">{0}</span><span class="s1"> -</span><span class="si">{1}</span><span class="s1">'</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">path_width</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">path_height</span><span class="p">),</span>
            <span class="p">]</span>


        <span class="c1"># major second</span>
        <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="n">item</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="n">path_commands</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span>
                <span class="s1">'M</span><span class="si">{0}</span><span class="s1"> </span><span class="si">{1}</span><span class="s1">'</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">y</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">path_height</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">),</span>
                <span class="s1">'v </span><span class="si">{0}</span><span class="s1">'</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">path_height</span><span class="p">),</span>
                <span class="s1">'h </span><span class="si">{0}</span><span class="s1">'</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">path_width</span><span class="p">),</span>
                <span class="s1">'v -</span><span class="si">{0}</span><span class="s1">'</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">path_height</span><span class="p">),</span>
            <span class="p">]</span>
            
        <span class="n">group_els</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span>
            <span class="n">sw</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">path</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Path</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">path_commands</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">**</span><span class="n">cell_path_attrs</span><span class="p">),</span>
            <span class="c1">#sw.shapes.Rect(insert=(x, y), size=(cell_width, line_height), **cell_rect_attrs),</span>
            <span class="c1">#sw.text.Text(item, insert=(x, y), **cell_text_attrs)</span>
        <span class="p">]</span>

        <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">element</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">group_els</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="n">cell_group</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">add</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">element</span><span class="p">)</span>

        <span class="n">dwg</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">add</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cell_group</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="c1"># returns <svg /> table:</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">dwg</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">tostring</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

entry.content:
C  D  E
   2  4

$('code.tabular').each(function() {
text = $(this).text()
lines=text.split('\n')

table=[]
ttext = "<table border='1'>";

for(i=0;lines[i];i++)
{
    ttext += (i==0) ? "<thead>" : "<tbody>";

    ttext += "<tr>"
    columns = lines[i].split('  ');
    for(x=0; columns[x] != null; x++) ttext += "<td>"+ columns[x] +"</td>";
    ttext += "</tr>";

    ttext += (i==0) ? "</thead>" : "</tbody>";
}
ttext += "</table>\n";

$(ttext).insertAfter($(this).parent())
$(this).parent().remove()
})

The algo is major column element plus 2 spaces. It is counted by the first row and should be correctly aligned with it.

entry.content:
• Greek Modes
    • Standard
      • Diatonic Scale Shapes
      • Mode Abbreviations
    • Mnemonics
      • Formulating mode from major degree
      • Formulating key from enharmonic tonic

Greek Modes

We were thinking about greek modes these days.

intervals  P1 m2 M2 m3 M3 P4 TT P5 m6 M6 m7 M7 P8
semitones  00 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 09 10 11 12
ionian     c     d     e  f     g     a     b  c
dorian     d     e  f     g     a     b  c     d
phrygian   e  f     g     a     b  c     d     e
lydian     f     g     a     b  c     d     e  f
myxolidian g     a     b  c     d     e  f     g
aeolian    a     b  c     d     e  f     g     a
locrian    b  c     d     e  f     g     a     b

Standard

Diatonic Scale Shapes

We are currently sketching a standard to represent a diatonic scale shape for instrument tuned in fifths.

ionian:     0110|0110
dorian:     0101|0101
phrygian:   0011|0011
lydian:     0111|0110
myxolidian: 0110|0101
aeolian:    0101|0011
locrian:    0011|1110

maybe we use b for the base, so we can shift it. Also can use r for root, t for tonic etc.

We should achieve a standard notation that allows shifting the base tonic seamlessly.

Mode Abbreviations

We can use i, d, p, l, m, a, l

Mnemonics

Giving the ascending major scale degrees with the semitones:

PI M2 M3 P4 P5 M6 M7
0  2  4  5  7  9  11

Formulating mode from major degree

We do this by the ascending major scale degrees:

  I  II III  IV   V  VI VII
  I   D   P   L   M  A  L

Formulating key from enharmonic tonic

We use the Major scale intervals, but in descending order to achieve this.

  • I ─ First Degree (C, CM)
  • D ─ Descending Second (C, BbM)
  • P ─ Descending Major Third (C, AbM)
  • L ─ Descending Perfect Fourth (C, GM)
  • M ─ Descending Perfect Fifth (C, FM)
  • A ─ Descending Major Sixth (C, EbM)
  • L ─ Descending Major Seventh (C, C#M)
